column4: Inbound Athens Boonesboro Rd in front of Jacobson Park
column5: Three vehicles involved.  At least one inbound lane is blocked.  All outbound lanes are shutdown with traffic diverted to Old Richmond Rd.
Police are directing traffic.  Technicians are enroute.

column4: Outbound Tates Creek Rd at New Circle Rd
column5: The right lane is blocked under the overpass.

column4: The ferry is back open on a regular schedule.  It has been closed due to high water conditions.
